prompts.text: A silver-haired scientist in her 60s wearing a lab coat, looking through a high-tech microscope in a futuristic laboratory with holographic displays in the background.
A tattooed chef with a mohawk, wearing a black apron, flame-grilling steaks in an industrial-style open kitchen with customers visible at the bar.
A ballerina with her hair in a tight bun, performing a graceful arabesque on a dimly lit stage, with soft spotlights and an ornate theater backdrop.
An astronaut in a white spacesuit with a reflective visor, floating above the curved surface of the Earth, with the blackness of space and distant stars visible.
A stern-looking judge with grey hair and glasses, wearing traditional robes, sitting behind a raised bench in a wood-paneled courtroom filled with people.
A young graffiti artist with colorful paint-splattered clothes, creating a vibrant mural on a brick wall in a busy urban alleyway at dusk.
An elderly yoga instructor with long silver hair in a braid, demonstrating a complex pose on a cliff overlooking a serene ocean at sunrise.
A muscular firefighter covered in soot, carrying a child through the smoky doorway of a burning building with flames visible in the background.
A bearded lumberjack wearing a plaid shirt and suspenders, chopping wood with an axe in a misty pine forest with a log cabin visible in the distance.
A stylish DJ with neon-colored hair and futuristic sunglasses, mixing tracks on a high-tech console at a crowded outdoor music festival at night.
